text: Stirling () is a city in the middle of Scotland. Stirling was very important a long time ago because it is at the centre of Scotland. Battles were fought at Bannockburn and Stirling Bridge, and there is a castle in the city. During part of the Middle Ages it was the capital of the Kingdom of Scotland. ==Famous places== * Bannockburn * Braehead * Broomridge * Cambusbarron * Cambuskenneth * Causewayhead * Cornton * Kings Park * Raploch * Riverside * Stirling Castle * St. Ninians * Top of the Town * Torbrex ==Related pages== *Robert I of Scotland *William Wallace Category:Stirling
title: Stirling
